caption.p: Variation of the main phenolic compounds in Satureja hortensis L. herb samples during vegetation phases determined using high-performance liquid chromatography—DPPH. V1—intensive growth, V2—budding, F1—beginning of flowering, F2—massive flowering, F3—end of flowering. Mean values ± SD from three independent experiments are presented. a statistically significant differences, ( p < 0.05).
